embeds.title: About Exton Server Pass
embeds.description: Looking to boost your community's safety and efficiency? With the Server Pass, your Discord gets full access to the Exton system ‚Äì ideal for teams and growing projects. Run Twitter checks directly from your server, monitor reused usernames, and get scam alerts in real-time (soon). Give your roles the tools they need to keep everyone safe.
